= Introduction =

Thanks for trying Maestro! This short tutorial prepares you with the basic knowledge about how to use Maestro as an OpenFlow controller. Because it is an OpenFlow controller, this tutorial heavily relies on the latest [http://www.openflowswitch.org/wk/index.php/HOTITutorial2010 OpenFLowTutorial]. Please first be familiar with it to know that how to setup a virtual machine and the network topology inside, to be able to run Maestro to control the switches inside it.
